Text: RE TX SET nominations and electionssmith PST Heidi How will voting be done Each company gets one vote All people who attendparticipate get a vote each Dave Entergy Original Message From Schrab Heidi mailto Sent Monday January AM To Subject TX SET nominations and elections Please be prepared to make nominations on Tuesday We will vote on Wednesday for a new Chair and Cochair Thanks Heidi

RE Texas Set Meeting Jan nd and rd Cc PST Kyle Hot topics make it even more important to reschedule this meeting We get into problems by rushing into making decisions when we are not prepared We decide something without the correct information and then later after we spend resources on this we make additional changes which cost additional resources One week would not hurt us In my opinion it makes sense to take an extra week or so to have the information provided up front for review and get prepared for a meeting Also it is hard to rearrange a work schedule at the last minute Some people who might want to attendparticipate may not be able to do so There may not be anyone from Entergy attending and participating And as you know we do attend and participate Dave Entergy Original Message From Patrick Kyle mailto Sent Monday January AM To ROBESON DAVE Cc WALLACE PAMELA H BUCK KENNETH W BREAKFIELD JAMES W Subject RE Texas Set Meeting Jan nd and rd Dave We have too many hot topics to let this get pushed Sorry about the short notice but I think SET really needs this meeting this week Just my opinion though Thanks Kyle Original Message From ROBESON DAVE mailto Sent Monday January AM To Cc WALLACE PAMELA H BUCK KENNETH W BREAKFIELD JAMES W Subject RE Texas Set Meeting Jan nd and rd It is hard to get travel and hotel reservations with a one day notice Want to attend and participate but am not sure I can get there There are a lot of issues on the agenda Many of these probably have some material which could be provided up front so we can be prepared to reviewdiscuss Would it be possible to reschedule this for next week Dave Entergy Original Message From mailto Sent Monday January AM To Subject Texas Set Meeting Jan nd and rd First of all sorry for the late notice Heidi and I did not have our signals straight The next Texas Set meeting is scheduled for tomorrow Jan and Wednesday January rd in Austin at the ERCOT center room B The meeting is scheduled from on Tuesday and on Wednesday The agenda items are as follows Nominations for Chair and Vice Chair Proposed changes to Change Control process point to point contingency Final review of Review data gatherings findings Revist ERCOT validation of date in the past Change control and Tabled questions from Change control call CSA move inout gaps Texas Set rejection of response transactions at ERCOT Muni Coop transactions and Cary Reed Sr Business Standards Consultant audinet

RE Texas Set Meeting Jan nd and rd Cc PST It is hard to get travel and hotel reservations with a one day notice Want to attend and participate but am not sure I can get there There are a lot of issues on the agenda Many of these probably have some material which could be provided up front so we can be prepared to reviewdiscuss Would it be possible to reschedule this for next week Dave Entergy Original Message From mailto Sent Monday January AM To Subject Texas Set Meeting Jan nd and rd First of all sorry for the late notice Heidi and I did not have our signals straight The next Texas Set meeting is scheduled for tomorrow Jan and Wednesday January rd in Austin at the ERCOT center room B The meeting is scheduled from on Tuesday and on Wednesday The agenda items are as follows Nominations for Chair and Vice Chair Proposed changes to Change Control process point to point contingency Final review of Review data gatherings findings Revist ERCOT validation of date in the past Change control and Tabled questions from Change control call CSA move inout gaps Texas Set rejection of response transactions at ERCOT Muni Coop transactions and Cary Reed Sr Business Standards Consultant audinet

RE Change Control Conference Call Cc PST I agree with Eds commentsalso we are getting closer to when changes which may be included with V need to be locked down and these change controls are associated with requirements approved by the market participants Dave Entergy Original Message From Skiba Edward Sent Tuesday February PM To Cc Odle David Standard Electronic Transactions Subject Re Change Control Conference Call Carey We have change controls to review this week and questions to address If we wait until next week Id be concerned we will not have enough time to get through two weeks worth of changes and questions in a one hour meeting Regards Ed Atlanta New Orleans cel Fax on PM To Odle David cc Standard Electronic Transactions Subject Re Change Control Conference Call Susan I have not had a chance to look at what we have for this week but unless we have something that is pressing I recommend that we postpone the call until next week Cary Reed Sr Business Standards Consultant audinet Odle David To Standard dElectronic Transactions PM cc Subject Change Control Conference Call Due to a family emergency I will not be able to facilitate the Change Control Conference Call this Friday We have two options Cancel the call until next week Someone else facilitate if you choose this option I will rely on Kyle Patricks excellent notes to get the logs and everything updated The log will be a week delayed in getting updated however I will make this a priority when I return next week I will be available by Cell Phone Thank You Dave Odle Dave Odle Retail Transaction Lead ERCOT The Texas Connection Mobile
